Texts.Chs:
数据日志-输入42 

几年前，以利提亚联盟的领导人发现大地守护团的存在时，就决定与该组织进行友好的沟通。 根据决议联盟中的每个国家都要派几名大使到地球，而我是为这一任务而被选中的少数幸运者之一。
Texts.Eng:
DATALOG - ENTRY 42

When the leaders of the Elithian Alliance discovered the existence of the Terrene Protectorate a few years ago, the decision was made to initiate friendly communication with the organization. It was decided that every nation in the Alliance was to send a handful of ambassadors to Earth, and I was one of the lucky few to be chosen for the task.

Texts.Chs: 我现在训练接近尾声，我想说整次作业都取得了巨大的成功。 我们已经了解了很多有关守护团的知识，而这些人反过来也是如此。 联盟与守护团之间建立了贸易路线，其他条约也正在制定中。 看来我们所有人都有光明的未来。
Texts.Eng: I'm now nearing the conclusion of my training, and I would say the entire operation has been a great success. We have learned much about the Protectorate, and they of us in turn. There are trade routes being set up between the nations of the Alliance and those of the Protectorate, and other treaties are being written as well. It looks like we all have a bright future ahead of us.

Texts.Chs: 我的任务是注册守护团培训计划，从而成为守护者。 同时，我将担任雏机环线和整个联盟的大使，以增进相互了解与合作。
Texts.Eng: My task was to enroll in the Protectorate training program, and thus become a Protector. In the meanwhile, I would act as an ambassador for the Trink Circuit and the Alliance as a whole, to foster mutual understanding and cooperation.

Texts.Chs: 在这里的培训结束后，我将回到联盟一段时间，以在那里进一步讨论我的经验。 我会想念守护团的，但是 再 次 回 到 家 会 很 好。
Texts.Eng: Once my training here is over, I'll return to the Alliance for some time, to further discuss my experiences here. I'll miss the Protectorate, but it'll be good to be home again.
